title: Mathew St. Patrick
text:
Mathew St. Patrick (born March 17, 1968) is an American actor best known for his portrayal of Adrian Sword in "<a href="All%20My%20Children">All My Children</a>" (1998-2000), <a href="Keith%20Charles%20%28Six%20Feet%20Under%29">Keith Charles</a> on the <a href="HBO">HBO</a> drama television series "<a href="Six%20Feet%20Under%20%28TV%20series%29">Six Feet Under</a>", Detective Kenneth Majorino in "<a href="Reunion%20%28TV%20series%29">Reunion</a>" and Moses Cartwright in "<a href="Sons%20of%20Anarchy">Sons of Anarchy</a>," and his film roles in "<a href="War%20%282007%20film%29">War</a>" (2007) and "<a href="Alien%20Raiders">Alien Raiders</a>" (2008).
Early life.
Mathew was born and raised in <a href="Philadelphia">Philadelphia</a>, and was on the varsity track team of <a href="Olney%2C%20Philadelphia%2C%20Pennsylvania%23Education">Olney High School</a>, but graduated in 1986 from Scotland School for Veterans' Children in <a href="Scotland%2C%20Pennsylvania">Scotland, Pennsylvania</a>, the last remaining school for children of military veterans in the United States.
After graduating from high school, he lived in New York and then for eight years in Chicago, where he worked as a delivery salesman for Coca-Cola, for UPS, for a furniture store, and for Union Pacific Railroad.
Acting career.
In 1994, St. Patrick moved to Los Angeles to begin his acting career. In Los Angeles, he first worked as a personal trainer then in 1996 joined the West Coast Theater Ensemble.
Prior to being cast in 2001 as Keith Charles in the HBO series, "<a href="Six%20Feet%20Under%20%28TV%20series%29">Six Feet Under</a>", St. Patrick was cast as Detective <a href="Marcus%20Taggert">Marcus Taggert</a> on "<a href="General%20Hospital">General Hospital</a>" (1997) and as Adrian Sword on "<a href="All%20My%20Children">All My Children</a>" (1998–2000). He was the first voice of <a href="Skulker%20%28Danny%20Phantom%29">Skulker</a> (2004) on "<a href="Danny%20Phantom">Danny Phantom</a>" and starred as the principal detective in the <a href="Fox%20Broadcasting%20Company">Fox</a> fall drama series, "<a href="Reunion%20%28TV%20series%29">Reunion</a>" (2005). Additionally, he played an FBI agent in the film "<a href="War%20%282007%20film%29">War</a>" (2007) and Seth in the science fiction horror film "<a href="Alien%20Raiders">Alien Raiders</a>" (2008), and he appeared on the <a href="Eminem">Eminem</a> album "<a href="Relapse%20%28Eminem%20album%29">Relapse</a>" (2009), in the skit "Mr. Mathers", and in the pilot of the TV series "". He had a recurring role during the final season of the award-winning <a href="FX%20%28TV%20channel%29">FX</a> drama "<a href="Sons%20of%20Anarchy">Sons of Anarchy</a>", as Moses Cartwright.
Personal life.
St. Patrick has a son.
